thread.title: STURGEON BLOW: Poll of Scots says Theresa May is doing BETTER job than SNP leader
thread.title_full: STURGEON BLOW: Poll of Scots says Theresa May is doing BETTER job than SNP leader

title: STURGEON BLOW: Poll of Scots says Theresa May is doing BETTER job than SNP leader
text:
STURGEON BLOW: Poll of Scots says Theresa May is doing BETTER job than SNP leader STURGEON BLOW: Poll of Scots says Theresa May is doing BETTER job than SNP leader NICOLA Sturgeon was dealt a blow after a poll of Scottish voters said Theresa May was doing a better job than the Scottish First Minister. PUBLISHED: 08:43, Tue, Mar 21, 2017 | UPDATED: 09:03, Tue, Mar 21, 2017 GETTY Theresa May is doing a better job than Nicola Sturgeon, a poll has found 
In the same week the Scottish National Party leader announced her plans for a independence referendum to drag Scotland out of the Union, Theresa May ’s approval rating was put at six percentage points higher than Ms Sturgeon’s. 
A data survey of more than 2,000 people living in Scotland by Sky News also put Scottish Conservative head Ruth Davidson five points ahead of the prime minister. 
While embattled Labour leader Jeremy Corbyn came out worse in the approval ratings. Related articles
